songs.title: Truly
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Truly
I want you truly
Truly
I want you truly

[Verse 1]
And it would mean so much to me
If you could understand
That I need You
Just to be my lover girl

[Chorus
Really
I want you near me
Really
If you could hear me

[Verse 2]
Cause you don’t my love baby
You’ve got to change your plan
Cause I need you
Just to be my lover girl

[Chorus]
Truly
I love you truly
Truly
I love you truly

Yeah now now
Oh yeah yeah

[Chorus]
Really
I want you near me
Really
If you could hear me

[Verse 2 Repeat]
Cause you don’t my love baby
You’ve got to change your plan
Cause I need you
Just to be my lover girl
I said its

[Chorus]
Truly
